<style>
.comparison-heading {font-size:35px;font-size:min(4vw,35px)!important;line-height:1.4em;max-width: min(558px,80%);background:rgb(255 255 255 / 80%);position: absolute;top: 20vh;font-size: min(4vw,36px)!important;}
.comparison-heading>*{padding: 48px 62px 62px;padding: 1.2em 1.8em 1.8em;font-size: min(4vw,36px)!important;}
.hero-natural--template--16734009393377__165174024841897347{
height:600px !important
}
.comparison-heading p{font-size:35px;font-size: min(5vw,35px)!important;line-height:1.4em}
.comparison-desc p {
  text-align: center;
  max-width: min(80%, 87em);
  font-size: min(4vw,24px)!important;
margin:auto
}
.hero-natural--template--16735576064225__165174024841897347{
min-height:360px
}
</style>

settings.subheading: Sound Box StoreÂ was born out of years of frustration in the commercial workplace seeking last-minute meeting rooms, searching for an office to take confidential calls/works, or simply looking for a quiet zone to focus on that critical presentation.

settings.text: See how Sound Box Store booths comapare toother office booths
Sound Box Store specialist offers the highest technological advancements in acoustic meeting rooms, zoom rooms and phone booths.

settings.code:
<style>
.comparison-table-wrap {
  overflow: auto;
  font-size: min(4vw, 11px);
  width: 100%;
}
.comparison-table-wrap table {
  width: 100%;
  table-layout: auto;
  border: none;
  border-spacing: 0px;
  border-width: 0;
  border-style: hidden;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px #fff;
}
.comparison-table-wrap {
  --cell-color-1: #dadada;
  --cell-color-2: #f4f4f4;
  --cell-color-3: #eeeeee;
  --sound-box-color-1: #ed3443;
  --sound-box-color-2: #f5c4c4;
  --sound-box-color-3: #f7e2e2;
}
.comparison-table thead th {
  background: var(--cell-color-1);
  padding:  min(1.4em,3vw);
  text-transform: lowercase;
  border-bottom: 1px solid white;
  border-left: 1px solid white;
  border-right: 1px solid white;
  font-size: min(2.4em,4vw);
  padding: 0.8em 0.4em;
}
.comparison-table thead th:first-child {
  position: sticky;
  text-transform: capitalize;
  left: 0;
  min-width: 6em;
  max-width: 6em;
}
.comparison-table thead th:nth-child(2) {
  color: var(--sound-box-color-1);
  background: var(--sound-box-color-2);
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: min(2em,3.6vw);
  line-height: 1.3;
}
.comparison-table th:first-child {
  background: var(--cell-color-1);
  border: none;
  border-right: 12px solid #bebebe;
}
.comparison-table tbody th:first-child {
  background: var(--cell-color-1);
  border: none;
  border-right: 12px solid #bebebe;
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 0px #fff;
}
.comparison-table tbody th:first-child {
  position: sticky;
  left: 0;
  padding: min(4vw,2em);
  background: var(--cell-color-2);
  font-size: min(3vw,18px);
}
.comparison-table tbody td {
  padding: min(4vw,2em);
  background: var(--cell-color-2);
  border-top: 2px solid white;
  border-left: 1px solid white;
  border-right: 1px solid white;
max-width:240px;
}
.comparison-table tbody td:nth-child(2) {
  background: var(--sound-box-color-3);
  border-left: none;
}
.comparison-table p {
  white-space: pre-line;
  font-size: min(4vw,16px);
}
.comparison-table tbody tr:nth-child(even) td:not(:nth-child(2)) {
  background: var(--cell-color-3);
}
.comparison-table tbody tr:nth-child(even) th:not(:nth-child(2)) {
  background: var(--cell-color-3);
}

.comparison-table tbody td > div {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  min-height: 100px;
}
.comparison-table th {
  text-align: center;
}
.comparison-table tbody td > div svg {
  font-size: min(4vw,2.6em);
}
.comparison-table tbody td:nth-child(2) > div svg {
  fill: var(--sound-box-color-1);
}
.comparison-table thead th:first-child {
  min-width: min(30vw, 300px);
  max-width: min(30vw, 300px);
  padding:0;
  width: min(30vw, 300px);
}
.comparison-table-heading {
  width: min(30vw, 300px);
  height: min(15vw, 190px);
  position: sticky;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: start;
  align-items: center;
  height: auto;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 1000px;
  margin-bottom: -10em;
}
.comparison-table-heading img {
  width: min(30%,300px);
  /* width: 80%; */
  margin: auto;
  display: block;
  height: auto;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 4em  2em;
}
.comparison-table-wrap {
  display: none;
}
.comparison-table-wrap .comparison-table-title {
  position: absolute;
  font-size: inherit;
  left: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  top: 44%;
  padding: 0 0.8em;
  justify-content: start;
  /* max-width: 35vw; */
  width: 500px;
  margin: 0;
  font-weight: bold;
  flex: 1;
  position: static;
  width: auto;
  font-size: min(6vw,3.2em);
  margin-top: 12px;
}
#input-solo:checked ~ #comparison-solo {
  display: block;
}
#input-medium:checked ~ #comparison-medium {
  display: block;
}
#input-large:checked ~ #comparison-large {
  display: block;
}
.comparison-left svg,
.comparison-right svg {
  font-size: 1.4em;
}
.comparison-right svg {
  transform: rotate(180deg);
}

.comparison-left {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 0px;
}
.comparison-right {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  right: 70%;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  .comparison-table-heading {
     margin-bottom:0px;
  }
  .comparison-table-heading img{
    padding: 2em;
    width: min(30vw, 300px);
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }
}
</style>

minutes, guaranteeing
excellent oxygen rates.
